ABOUT.HEADLINE: About me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I'm Milan Moreno, a Frontend Developer based in Freiburg, Germany. With a strong focus on creating exceptional user experiences, I specialize in building modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and best practices in software development.
ABOUT.TEXT1: As a dedicated developer, I excel in crafting clean, maintainable code and implementing responsive designs that work flawlessly across all devices. My expertise in Angular and TypeScript enables me to build scalable, enterprise-level applications that meet the highest standards of performance and reliability.
ABOUT.TEXT2: I thrive in collaborative environments and have a proven track record of delivering complex projects on time. My commitment to continuous learning keeps me at the forefront of web development trends, ensuring I can provide innovative solutions to modern technical challenges.

SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I specialize in creating dynamic web applications using modern technologies. My expertise spans across frontend development, with a strong foundation in responsive design and interactive user interfaces.
